title: New: Best Coast – How They Want Me To Be
content:
LA surf pop darlings Best Coast have dropped another new track, the deliciously Warpaint-esque How They Want Me To Be.

After premiering the Drew Barrymore directed star studded music video for Our Deal only a couple of days ago, Bethany Cosentino is clearly in a vein of rich songwriting form. How They Want Me To Be is searingly honest and gloriously lo-fi, as we’ve come to expect from Best Coast, with Cosentino bemoaning, “I don’t want to be how they want me to be, I want you”. With Bethany confirming on her blog that a sophomore Best Coast album is ‘still very far away from being created’, this track serves as a taster to tide over their legions of eager fans.

Best Coast aren’t allowing How They Want Me To Be to be embedded yet, so instead follow this link to hear the track.
